titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of October as "Brain Health Awareness Month".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of October as "Brain Health Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of Brain Health Awareness Month and encourages support for people living with diseases or injuries affecting the brain.
